gmailcleaner.name: GmailCleaner
gmailcleaner.shortDescription: Automate your Gmail inbox management. Create custom rules to organize emails automatically, archive newsletters, and maintain a clean inbox with intelligent automation.

invoicesense.name: InvoiceSense AI
invoicesense.shortDescription: Easily manage your personal finances. Automatically scan receipts, track expenses, and organize your budget with our user-friendly AI solution.

mailsense.name: MailSense AI
